story: You hear a faint hum coming from the dark alleyway ahead. As you approach, you notice a group of cybernetic wolves guarding a crate filled with advanced technology. What do you do?

actions.action: Try to negotiate with the cybernetic wolves for access to the crate
actions.good: Your smooth talking skills impress the cybernetic wolves, who reluctantly allow you to take the valuable technology from their crate. Your diplomacy pays off.
actions.bad: Your attempt at negotiations falls flat as the cybernetic wolves growl and lunge at you. You take damage before managing to flee empty-handed.

actions.action: Attempt to hack into the wolves' system for access
actions.good: With your expert tech skills, you bypass the wolves' advanced security systems, gaining entry to the crate filled with valuable technology. Your cybernetic savvy pays off.
actions.bad: Your attempt at hacking the wolves' system results in a loud alarm sounding out. The wolves become hostile and cause damage as they fight for control of the crate.

actions.action: Fight your way through the pack of cybernetic wolves to reach the crate
actions.good: With impressive fighting skills, you take down the pack of cybernetic wolves, clearing a path to the crate filled with valuable technology. Your combat prowess pays off.
actions.bad: Your battle with the cybernetic wolves leaves you battered and bruised, and you still can't get your hands on the crate's advanced technology.
